alert.note: Alert for Fremont; Mills; Montgomery; Page; Pottawattamie (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 12 at 12:18AM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of eastern Fremont, Montgomery, southeastern Mills, southeastern Pottawattamie and Page Counties through 115 AM CDT... At 1217 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles northwest of Griswold to 2 miles southeast of Riverton. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree branches and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Shenandoah around 1230 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Coin, Grant, Blanchard, College Springs, Shambaugh and Braddyville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
